sectionText: Case Management:  This course will acquaint students with the systematic process of achieving optimal rehabilitation outcomes for clients through the effective application of counseling and managerial skills. Students will also learn about recent developments in managed care for persons with disabilities and chronic health conditions in the Federal/State vocational rehabilitation system and civilian sectors. Major issues in caseload management will be addressed, helping students develop crucial skills in caseload analysis, goal setting, scheduling, and consumer satisfaction.
